title: can i be instantly promoted please?
body:
for sitting through like 10 fuckin dodges in a row wasting my fucking time!

Edit: now i get autofilled jg and my duo autofilled supp despite him having jg as his secondary role.
fuck your matchmaking system riot games. and i bet you no one will dodge this queue, so not holy i wasted a good 40 mins trying to play a single game i then get autofilled to a role i didnt want. nice game riot 10/10
